extendedInfo.description: Active lockscreen brings together fast access to your favorite apps and full personalization features for your Android phone. Your favorite apps, your latest contacts, your photo gallery, are available within just one click. Active comes with hundreds of themes and appetizers available to download that let you flip through your social and news feeds directly on your home screen. After installing, you can use one swipe on your new lock screen to:â¢	Call your favorite numbers, recent contacts or open the phoneâs dialerâ¢	View and access your personalized photo galleryâ¢	Launch recently used apps or predefined appsâ¢	Stream social media updates on your locked screenâ¢	Send text messages or communicate through any messaging app you have installed.â¢	Launch your camera or any picture related apps.â¢	Read personalized content that are streamed with a previewConnect with us: Visit Active at http://www.celltick.com/active/  or email us at support+android@celltick.com. Follow us at @Celltick on Twitter, on Facebook at http://www.celltick.com/facebook and Google+ at http://www.celltick.com/googleplus

reviews.title: Simply n Easy
reviews.comment: Great app to use... very simple n easy to use... not lagging and bery responsive...
reviews.author: ToM KrOoKsTeR

reviews.title: Note2
reviews.comment: Great lock screen one if the best if used INA while really love the clean ui no lagg at all very fast and to the point I can quick launch all my favorite applications thank you developer
reviews.author: Myke Cole

reviews.title: Incredible
reviews.comment: I loved this at first,  but uses the same amount of battery in the background as the active screen for the phone. Also doesn\'t connect to facebook though FB is indicated Please reduce battery consumption!
reviews.author: kyle wraij

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: Thanx so much for all the lovely themes.one of the best lockscreen apps ever keep up the great work :-)
reviews.author: Stacey Jackson

reviews.title: Very Nice!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been a Go Locker user for several months, & I Really love the way Active locks & works! Love that I can change the size& color of the clock/date. If we could make the time a little  bigger & there were more themes to choose from (like maybe a bright Pink Breast Cancer Awareness theme) then I would defiantly say 5 stars! Great job!
reviews.author: Terri Noble

reviews.title: Awesome but...
reviews.comment: Wen you enable security it locks your original lock so you have to go through 2 unlock screens please fix for 5 stars c:
reviews.author: Oscar Gomez

reviews.title: Cool & fun...
reviews.comment: Nice...& good apps
reviews.author: Jafferi Jaafar

reviews.title: Cool App.
reviews.comment: I like the quick access to your app. from lock screen..so far no problem using this app. 5 star for now and it\'s worth to share...Excellent!!
reviews.author: Zaldy Bitonga

reviews.title: So far, so good
reviews.comment: Useful and free. My phone is locked by the network so now I can change widgets on the home screen
reviews.author: Michael McInerney

reviews.title: Highly recommended.
reviews.comment: Stable, functional, customizable & quick access to other apps, information & settings easily make this one of my favourite programs.  Thank you!
reviews.author: B. Parsons

reviews.title: Slick and convenient
reviews.comment: It looks great and it\'s customizable enough that I was able to make it access exactly what I wanted, without having a bunch of extras.
reviews.author: chris martens

reviews.title: UNINSTALLING! DRAINS BATTERY.
reviews.comment: This app is great! I\'m using the orange, kitten theme. However,my issues are that there is a double lock screen bug, the app  drains battery way too fast, Facebook doesn\'t launch, and would like a choice of some puppy theme\'s. Fix and 5 stars. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Janayia Welton

reviews.title: Try it now!!
reviews.comment: Greattt app.....pls allow selected theme to randomly change by certain time or settings. Too many great themesss... luv it yo!!!
reviews.author: melcoool P

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Simply the best lock screen replacement, hands down. I\'ve tried many others but this has all the features I could ever want, and it works flawlessly. Great work devs!
reviews.author: Robert Thompson

reviews.comment: 1st of all best Locker. But wiem i try change my shortcut in Phone and im trying add contact from book, not recent app is crashing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please Fix
reviews.comment: This App Is Awesome, I Rate 3 Stars, It Would Be Nice If I Can Set My Own Date And Time, And Open Facebook Via Lock Screen, Please Fix When This Is Done, Then I Will Rate 5 Stars!
reviews.author: Rachel Higgs

reviews.title: Tablet support please!
reviews.comment: There\'s no reason why an elegant lock screen like this shouldn\'t be able to run on a 7\" device.  Please add support for that.  Thanks.
reviews.author: Nathanael Fish

reviews.comment: Awesome app. I highly recommend it to anyone who wants a touch of class on his/her device.
reviews.author: J Sid

reviews.author: Kketchya Lackkin

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: It does not show your notifications on the locked screen. Which makes it difficult to see what notification have you got. Please fix.
reviews.author: Gayatri Goswami
